channel.title: Elevation on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Elevation on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-84 East - Elevation 5462 Feet
item.description: Elevation 5462 approaching the eastern end of I-84. There is also an elevation sign at the Idaho-Utah state line on I-84.

item.title: I-80 West - Elevation 6860 Feet
item.description: I-80 west Elevation 6860 Feet. Many highways entering Utah have the elevation listed at or near the state line.

item.title: US-40 West - Daniels Summit
item.description: Daniels Summit - Elevation 8020 Feet on US-40 west.

item.title: CA-89 North - Elevation 8000 Feet
item.description: Elevation 8000 Feet on CA-89 north. Taken on north descent from Monitor Pass.

item.title: US-550 North - Elevation 7000 Feet
item.description: Elevation 7000 Feet, descending from the Continental Divide on US-550 north.
